title: La Cantina del Huerto de Lucas
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant inside the La Huerta de Lucas, where one can find an organic store, different market stands (produce, bakery, ice creams, juice bar, tea/coffee) and an organic beauty center. A haven with hanging and vertical gardens, an indoor seating area and a social awareness towards special needs and special choice diets, including vegan.
